About MeProjectsContact Me

I consider myself a generalist at the end of the day.

I am a freelance marketing professional with experience in multiple industries. I work with clients to develop actionable marketing campaigns that convert and drive sales. In addition to marketing I have a variety of other interests and side projects.

Entrepreneurship

As a teenager I used to ride my bicycle around and fix computers for people. Although I was not always self aware of it, I have had entrepreneurial tendencies my whole life. I love to hustle and work on new and exciting things.

Cryptocurrency

I stumbled upon the Bitcoin whitepaper back in 2016 and have not looked back. I am an active ivestor in a bunch of Crypto projects and have recently been excited about DeFi and AMM related projects.

Programming

I am self taught and would not consider myself an expert by any means. This site was coded using Gridsome, Vue, and Tailwind CSS. It took me multiple iterations to even get to this working build.
